webscript.shortname: DELETE permanently (purge) a node or nodes from the archive
webscript.description:
DELETE /api/archive/{store_type}/{store_id} purges all items from the archive store which were
originally located in the specified Store. e.g. workspace://SpacesStore
DELETE /api/archive/{store_type}/{store_id}/{id} purges the specified item from the archive store.
For this call, the URL should identify the Node's current NodeRef e.g. archive://SpacesStore/1234-5678-90
